稻城.definition: Daocheng county (Tibetan: 'dab pa rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

稻城縣.definition: Daocheng county (Tibetan: 'dab pa rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

稻田葦鶯.definition: (bird species of China) paddyfield warbler (Acrocephalus agricola)

稻田鷚.definition: (bird species of China) paddyfield pipit (Anthus rufulus)

稻荷壽司.definition: inarizushi (pouch of fried tofu typically filled with rice)
